rooms.description: This is the TARE control room
You are in a wheat field. The large blue box that you arrived in is to the north. To the east is an open gate and a road.
The wooden gate is crumbling and a couple of the horizontal bars are ready to snap. To the west is the TARDIS, to the south is more road.
The road is straight in a north south kind of way. There's a field to the north and more road to the south.
You're probably half way to the town now. Maybe a little more than a kilometre to the south. Unfortunately it looks like road works ahead. To the east is a quaint looking cottage farm house.

Whatever road works happened here have stopped. The workers have long since stopped working. It looks like they're on a break. Probably in the local town to the south. Unfortunately, that way is blocked for you.
The quaint cottage lies to the east in front of you. It's red roof and adobe walls give it a surreal appearance in the Welsh countryside.
